title: Getting Started
content: Welcome to Netdata! This application helps you monitor and manage your servers efficiently.

title: Frequently Asked Questions
content: How do I add a new server? Go to the 'Servers' page and click 'Add New Server'.
Where can I view logs? Check the 'Audit Log' page for recent actions.

title: Troubleshooting
content: If you encounter issues, check the following:
• Server not connecting: Verify your credentials and network settings.
• Data not updating: Check your monitoring agent status.
